com.jalios.jcms

Class JcmsSessionTrackerListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jalios.jcms.JcmsSessionTrackerListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.EventListener, javax.servlet.http.HttpSessionAttributeListener, javax.servlet.http.HttpSessionListener

    public class JcmsSessionTrackerListener
extends java.lang.Object
implements javax.servlet.http.HttpSessionAttributeListener, javax.servlet.http.HttpSessionListener
    This listener class tracks the addition, replacement or removal of the TRACKING_ATTRIBUTE_NAME attribute to the J2EE session. It updates the JcmsSessionTracker in consequence.
    Since:
    jcms-5.0.0
    Version:
    $Revision: 33267 $
    Author:
    Olivier Jaquemet
